divs: sighting detailsi was walking around the block with my 18mo old son, as we do every evening around 7pm. it was partly cloudy. i happened to look up, and saw a brilliantly 'white' cigar shaped\thin line object. it was moving much faster than anything i have ever seen, and moved in a straight line across the sky. slow enough that i watched it for about 4-5 seconds, but fast enough that it made me wonder what it was. it eventually went in or behind a large cloud and i no longer could see it. the object did not emit any trail or light per se, but it was so bright - almost like a mirror reflecting light. from my point of view, it was the size of grain of rice. it had no tails or lights that i could see. there were no other visible objects in the sky, and there was no sound. i never take my phone with me on our walks, as i have no where to put it in my running shorts. so unfortunately i do not have a photo. but, ive attached photos from google images, to get an idea of what i saw. basically: a bright white horizontal line moving east in a straight steady line. photo 1 = it looked like o1 photo 2 = pretty much exactly what i saw, but no blur at all. it was level. & very distinct photo 3 = picture with caption "cigar shaped mothership"
Summary: Brilliantly bright cigar/thin rectangular fast object in daylight...
